mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_M(BRD_TYPE_ID, BRD_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, BRD_NM, BRD_SBST, BRD_ST_DATE, BRD_ED_DATE, READ_CNT) VALUES(#{brd_type_id}, #{brd_id}, 'N', sysdate, #{cretr_id}, sysdate, #{cretr_id}, #{brd_nm}, #{brd_sbst}, #{brd_st_date}, #{brd_ed_date}, 0)

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_RPL_D(BRD_TYPE_ID, BRD_ID, RPL_NO, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, RPL_SBST, UP_RPL_NO) VALUES(#{brd_type_id}, #{brd_id}, #{rpl_no}, 'N', sysdate, #{cretr_id}, sysdate, #{cretr_id}, #{rpl_sbst}, #{up_rpl_no})

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_FILE_D(BRD_TYPE_ID, BRD_ID, FILE_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, FILE_NM, FILE_SYS_NM, FILE_PATH_NM, FILE_SIZE, DOWN_CNT) VALUES(#{brd_type_id}, #{brd_id}, #{file_id}, 'N', sysdate, #{cretr_id}, sysdate, #{cretr_id}, #{file_nm}, #{file_sys_nm}, #{file_path_nm}, #{file_size}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT BRD_TYPE_ID , BRD_ID , RPL_NO , DEL_YN ,TO_CHAR(CRET_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRET_DT ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CRETR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CRETR_ID ,TO_CHAR(CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHG_DT ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CHGR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CHGR_ID , RPL_SBST , UP_RPL_NO FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_RPL_D A WHERE BRD_TYPE_ID=#{brd_type_id} AND BRD_ID=#{brd_id} ORDER BY CRET_DT

SELECT COUNT(*) as TOTAL_CNT FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_M A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND BRD_TYPE_ID = #{brd_type_id}
AND (A.BRD_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' OR A.BRD_SBST LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%')
AND A.BRD_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND A.BRD_SBST LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'

SELECT A.BRD_TYPE_ID , A.BRD_ID , A.CRET_DT ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CRETR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CRETR_ID , A.CHG_DT ,(SELECT U.USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U WHERE A.CHGR_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS CHGR_ID , A.BRD_NM , A.BRD_SBST ,TO_CHAR(A.BRD_ST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BRD_ST_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.BRD_ED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BRD_ED_DATE , A.READ_CNT ,NVL(B.FILE_ID ,0) AS FILE_ID ,B.FILE_PATH_NM ,B.FILE_NM ,B.FILE_SYS_NM ,B.FILE_SIZE ,B.DOWN_CNT FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_M A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_BBS_BRD_FILE_D B ON(A.BRD_ID = B.BRD_ID AND A.BRD_TYPE_ID = B.BRD_TYPE_ID) WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BRD_ID=#{brd_id} AND A.BRD_TYPE_ID=#{brd_type_id}
